content: > espace tricot is a yarn store in > montreal canada discover our yarns > here www espacetricot com 1 en voyage is inspired by a never ending quest to find the perfect travel wrap knit with kelbourne woolens scout the ribbed border and simple stockinette body create a cozy and enveloping fabric which is complimented by sophisticated texture in the form of a staghorn cable running along one edge throw this lush accessory into your carry-on to ensure maximum comfort on your next trip by plane train bus or automobile other materials required 8 stitch markers cable needle tapestry needle to weave in ends
